title: House industries release Studio Lettering Fonts
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 7.Jul.2008 1.04pm 

After Ken Barber of House Industries took home [3 TDC2008 Awards](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2008Results/index.html) for [Studio Lettering Sable](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2008Results/Sable.html), [Sutdio Lettering Slant](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2008Results/Slant.html), and [Studio Lettering Swing](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2008Results/Swing.html), I’ve been chomping at the bit to see the entire set.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/screenshot1_5445.png)

The folks at House don’t disappoint. They’ve added more temptation beyond the fonts including an [ampersand mousepad](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=accessories&id=663&category=mousepads), [ampersand t-shirts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=clothing&id=667&category=studio_tees) (for the whole family no less!), [cast iron and cast aluminum ampersands](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=accessories&id=673&category=sculpture), as well as the [Studio Lettering Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153202/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=accessories&id=677&category=books). Isn’t there a Christmas in July tradition?
author: Miss Tiffany
